name: Beach Food Truck -Cooking Game
description:
Have you ever dreamt of becoming the world best cooking chef by playing one of the top chef games or fun restaurant chef games? Than welcome to crazy cooking madness world, since we bring a world of flavors into your life Beach Food Truck. Beach Food Truck is new restaurant cooking game where you set off to play as a master chef by providing delicious food & tasty cuisine in this kitchen game. Serve customers who visit your fun restaurant chef game with quality food and speed. Make customers happy by revealing the master chef inside you. Bake, cook, and grill your way to world-wide restaurant chef fame! The new restaurant world awaits a hot master chef in this addictive fun time management Beach Food Truck. Wear apron and get ready to cook some awesome foods in this beach food truck fun restaurant fever cooking game. It is an addicting time management fun restaurant fever cooking game that features endless play. So are you ready to become the crazy cooking world star in every restaurant fever kitchen game? Keep up with the rush hours, become better at time management. Become the superstar cook & start cooking master chef! Make your best meal in new restaurant cooking world and help the customers on your food stand.

Beach Food Truck Cooking Game featured with time-management and food-cooking RPG gameplay. Be a top master chef and do it all in a cooking fever, travel across the world and spread the Beach Food Truck cooking craze. Start your exploration adventure in the kitchen game, use various ingredients to cook delicious dishes with amazing recipes like spicy hamburgers, seafood, spaghetti, steaks, cola etc. Fulfil your dreams own a beach food truck in cooking world and traveling around the world! Cooking madness isn’t as simple as in mama kitchen upgrade your kitchen appliances to cook quick and fast, in this way you may improve your cuisine & also it will let you serve more customers. Cook breakfast, lunch, dinner shifts and desserts. By providing delicious food & tasty cuisine, please customers and make foodie paradise. Bake, cook, and grill meet unique customers, serve and delight them with your delicious recipes, and earn Coins and Tips. Dispense the dishes with your best recipes of your kitchen game. In the world of master chef cooking game experience serve exotic flavors all over the world with crazy cooking chef. You can start your crazy cooking adventure, bake, cook, and grill cook delicious meals, tasty cuisine & desserts from all over the world in this FREE addictive time-management game! Upgrade kitchen appliances & produce an even greater variety of dishes & tasty cuisine with kitchen utensils. Decorate your new restaurant cooking to attract more hungry customers. Use farm fresh ingredients to cook tasty dishes. Be the crazy cooking top chef in the world and please your hungry customers in this cooking craze a fast and fun restaurant game. Home chefs! get ready for a new kitchen story with an ultimate cooking fever.

Features:
• Run your own new restaurant and get carried away in a cooking fever!
• Practice time management kitchen game skills in a variety of cooking world techniques.
• Unlock lots of cool levels with unique dishes and ingredients.
• Unlock new items to upgrade your kitchen and be a master chef.
• Bake, grill, and serve food by using simple TAP.
• It is a FREE game + No wifi is required to play this cooking game.
